results.title: Hotkeys JS
results.description: Hotkeys.js is a lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript library for capturing and handling keyboard shortcuts with ease.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js enables you to create full-stack web applications by extending the latest React features and integrating powerful Rust-based JavaScript tooling for the fastest builds.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications. It provides additional features and optimizations, automatically configuring lower-level tools to help developers focus on building products quickly.

results.title: Ninja Keys
results.description: Ninja Keys is a keyboard shortcut interface for websites, compatible with Vanilla JS, Vue, and React, offering features like nested menus, customizable hotkeys, and built-in themes.

results.title: Next.js Boilerplate
results.description: A boilerplate and starter for Next.js 15+ with App Router, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, prioritizing developer experience with tools like ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, and Clerk authentication.

results.title: Next.js Starter
results.description: A Next.js 15 starter template with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui, Stripe, Next-auth, Drizzle ORM, and Jest for a robust and modern web application.

results.title: Next.js HCaptcha
results.description: A Next.js library that provides a higher-order function to guard Next.js API routes by integrating server-side hCaptcha verification.

results.title: Next.js Starter Template
results.description: A production-ready Next.js starter template with modern tooling, featuring Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, shadcn/ui, NextAuth.js, Drizzle ORM, Stripe integration, and comprehensive testing.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications, offering features like server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes.

results.title: Next.js Starter for WordPress Headless CMS
results.description: A Next.js starter template for building high-performance applications that fetch and render data from a WordPress headless CMS via its REST API, featuring type-safe data, server-side pagination, dynamic routes, and robust caching.

results.title: Next Sanity
results.description: Sanity toolkit for Next.js

results.title: AuthKit Next.js
results.description: AuthKit Next.js provides helpers for authentication and session management with WorkOS & AuthKit in Next.js applications, specifically for the App Router.

results.title: Next.js Auth Starter Template
results.description: A Next.js starter template pre-configured with Clerk for seamless authentication, featuring sign-in, sign-up, protected pages, and customizable components with Tailwind CSS.

results.title: Next QRCode
results.description: React hooks for generating QR codes in Next.js and React applications, supporting Canvas, SVG, and Image rendering with various customization options.

results.title: Cookies Next
results.description: A versatile cookie management library for Next.js applications, supporting both client-side and server-side operations with features like App Router and Server Components compatibility.

results.title: Hotkey
results.description: A JavaScript library for triggering actions on elements when specific keyboard shortcuts are pressed, used extensively on GitHub for all shortcuts.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: This repository provides starter templates and final code for Learn Next.js courses, covering App Router, data fetching, databases, auth, basics, TypeScript, and SEO.

results.title: Gemini 2.0 Image Editing with Next.js
results.description: A Next.js quickstart for generating and editing images using Google Gemini 2.0 Flash, allowing text-to-image creation and natural language-based image modifications with conversational context.

results.title: NextStep
results.description: Lightweight onboarding library for Next.js

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications, featuring file-system routing, API routes, and optimized rendering with the App Router.

results.title: React Hotkeys Hook
results.description: A React hook for using keyboard shortcuts in components in a declarative way, allowing for scopes and focus trapping.

results.title: NextStepjs
results.description: NextStepjs is a lightweight onboarding library for Next.js and React applications. It enables developers to implement user onboarding, interactive tutorials, and product tours.

results.title: Next SEO
results.description: Next SEO is a plugin that simplifies managing SEO in Next.js projects, offering features for meta tags, Open Graph, and JSON-LD.

results.title: Next ReCaptcha v3
results.description: A straightforward, tiny, and customizable solution for integrating Google's ReCaptcha V3 into your Next.js applications using TypeScript and next/script.

results.title: NextJS Template
results.description: A Next.js v15 project template with preconfigured Typescript, ESLint, Material-UI v7, Tailwind CSS v4, and Docker for containerization.

results.title: LangChain Next.js Template
results.description: LangChain + Next.js starter template

results.title: Next Forge
results.description: Next Forge is a production-grade Turborepo template for Next.js apps, offering a comprehensive and opinionated starting point for modern web applications with minimal configuration.

results.title: Next Maps
results.description: A lightweight, interactive, and customizable map built with Next.js App Router, styled with Tailwind CSS, and powered by Mapbox GL JS.

results.title: Lexical Playground Next.js
results.description: A Lexical Editor Playground built with Next.js, showcasing features like collaborative editing with Yjs, custom themes, and various plugins in a modern React environment.
